channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
Base: 508 pali76
Does anyone know how I can make it so that items are dropped on death? and if possible you change the locations you lose items on death. I know it can be done on 317 as there is "Fun pk" and then the wilderness so if anyone can help I will love you forever :)
